title: problema con google meet
content:
Salve, stamattina ho utilizzato google meet con firefox, come sempre, e tutto è andato bene, fotocamera e audio. Nel pomeriggio dovevo fare un'altra riunione ma meet non permetteva alla fotocamera e al microfono di funzionare e il popup "consenti..." si bloccava e non mi permetteva di cliccare. Se utilizzo direttamente il browser google chrome tutto funziona regolare, sembra un conflitto tra firefox e google meet. Ho provato anche a ripristinare firefox ma non funziona lo stesso. Chiedo se mi potete aiutare. Grazie.

Rimane tutto bloccato come nell'immagine allegata
creator: max.fagiani

title: How do I disable search suggestions based on my search history, without deleting my search history?
content:
I've disabled this for my google account. So when I search from google.com this behavior doesn't happen. But when I type anything into my address bar on Firefox to search, the first suggestions are from my search history.

I don't want to delete my search history.

I often use my search history to find specific things that I need, but didn't bookmark at the time. I need my search history to be saved. I just don't want to automatically receive suggestions based on it.

Is there any way to turn this off? Even with an extension or something?

title: Coloring of visited links
content:
I have used Firefox for many years and have one chosen color for all visited links. Since the latest automatic update to 125.0.1 a few days ago, the color for all visited links on the New York Times reverted back to the default color rather than my chosen one. My color was erased from all links. Now, in all sections, some of the clicked on links (articles) show my chosen color but many others do not change when I click on them. It has nothing to do with my settings as other sites show my color on all visited links. It seems to be an issue unique to the NYT's. I would appreciate any advice for you may wish to inform them? Thank you very much.

David

title: New PC migrating from old PC with Firefox v. 125.0.1 and Thunderbird v. 115.10.1 email client
content:
I've received my new PC and will be migrating from my old PC (Windows 10) to the new PC with Windows 11.

I use local folders in Thunderbird to keep various projects separate and more easy to manage. I have copied the current Thunderbird profile on to an external hard disk, I have found the location of the local folders and they reflect the structure in the Thunderbird screen I see. Thunderbird has been unstable for a few weeks so I would prefer a clean install but don't want to lose a lot of content that I still need.

1. Is there a way to copy over just the local folders, eg export them, rather than the whole profile? I deliberately haven't cleaned the server recently so that I can get back emails that still are in the in_tray but once they are in local folders they disappear from the Yahoo server. 2. Is there anything else significant I should be aware of before migrating? There is a backup on Mozilla but I prefer a clean install.

Thanks in advance,

Anne

title: "Invia Scheda a dispositivo" da PC ad Android non funziona più
content: Buongiorno a tutti. Ho cercato oramai soluzioni da un po' sia qui, sul supporto, che nel web e non ho ancora trovato soluzione. Come da titolo, dopo un lungo periodo in cui tutto ha funzionato per il meglio, ora la funzione "invia scheda a dispositivo" non funziona più per condividere la scheda aperta sul Computer verso il Cellulare Android mentre al contrario funziona regolarmente. Le altre impostazioni (password, cronologia, etc) funzionano correttamente. Ho anche aggiornato il tutto alle ultime versioni: utilizzo Firefox 125.0.1 (64 bit) sul PC e Firefox 124.2.0 su Android

title: Why is Firefox using so much memory for GPU processes?
content:
Hi there, I have noticed that my Win11 Asus laptop is always short on RAM (16GB available), with Firefox taking up a significant amount even with only a few tabs open.

As you can see by the attached image, when I go to 'about:processes' it shows that GPU processes alone are taking up nearly 1GB of memory, with the only tab running being the 'about' page. I only have 6 extensions (uBlock Origin, Zotero, Containers etc) none of which are meant to be RAM intensive.

What are these GPU processes that are running, and how can I reduce the memory used by them?

Thank you.

title: Super Problema ho bisogno di una soluzione in giornata sincronizzazione firefox e cancellazioni preferiti
content: Ho sincronizzato firefox su dispositivo mobile e desktop, sincronizzazione sempre fatta male o a meta perche non sincronizza appieno molti moltissimi segnalibri, per esempio nella barra dei segnalibri. Di recente ho diviso il computer in due account microsoft separati come se fossero due pc con un firefox in ogni account. Nel primo ho lasciato i segnalibri che uso di solito,ed ho spostato manualmente quelli che mi servivano. A questo punto volevo i segnalibri che ho nel dispositivo mobile nel secondo accont firefox, cosi ho attivato firefox sync su questo account e stranamente mi ha sincronizzato TUTTI i segnalibri del primo account, del secondo e mobile. Non volendo nel secondo account i preferiti del primo li ho cancellati tutti manualmente. tornando nel primo account pero, cazzo e scusa il cazzo, mi ha sincronizzato gli account del secondo anche nel primo. HO DAVVERO BISOGNO DI RECUPERARE I SEGNALIBRI DEL PRIMO ACCOUNT sono vitali per me. Da gestione segnalibri gli unici segnalibri rispristinabili sono del secondo account quando prima ne avevo una decina e non posso recuperare quelli perduti. Ovviamente i segnalibri eliminati manualmente non passano dal cestino e non posso recuperarli manualmente. Come faccio?Non vorrei fare un ripristino di sistema dato che non so nemmeno cosa succederebbe con il secondo account appena creato. Grazie

creator: bizbizbiz

title: Microphone very quiet when Firefox uses it on Mac
content:
Running Firefox 125.0.1 on MacOS 14.2.1, all audio input is very quiet for all applications, not just Firefox.

Experiments I ran:

  • people can barely hear me in Google Meets
  • microphone works great in Quicktime (making a recording) when Firefox is running but not receiving audio input
  • microphone is very quiet in Quicktime when running a Google Meet in Firefox
  • microphone is very quiet in Quicktime when running a discord voice channel in Firefox
  • microphone works great in Quicktime when running Google Meet in Chrome

This started maybe ~3 months ago for me. I'd love to see a fix, since Firefox is my favorite browser in most other ways - otherwise I'll have to give up and switch to Chrome at long last :'(
creator: m.w.loncaric

title: LastPass is now disabled with every Firefox restart
content: For the past few months every restart of Firefox disables LastPass. I did NOT have this problem previously. The version of LastPass is current (no updates found). I can go to Add-ons and the toggle is set to "on" but the icon in the menu bar is black. If I click the toggle off, then back on, LastPass comes on just fine. Why is Firefox disabling something that Add-ons says is loaded? VERY strange. Does NOT happen in Chrome. Thanks for any assistance. PITB!!!
creator: RobertL39

title: Downloads Freeze, And Firefox Process Won't End During Restart
content:
Hi,

Occasionally when downloading files on Firefox, they'll freeze completely (often at the very end.) There is no way to pause or cancel the downloads, except to restart Firefox.

When I attempt to restart Firefox, it closes the browser window. However, when I try to reopen it, I get an error message stating that Firefox is running but not responding. The 'Close Firefox' option does nothing, except make the box pop back up a moment later.

I can't kill the Firefox process in Task Manager or Process Explorer, because it says access is denied. I can't kill it using taskkill in command prompt because it says there is no running instance of the task.

The ONLY thing that seems to help is completely restarting the computer, which is getting frustrating to do several times a day.

I can confirm Firefox is up-to-date. Any tips are appreciated, thank you!
creator: iosuniverseyt
